summary: The diff implements the majority of requirements across REQ-83 through REQ-89. Key files are added (ServiceManagementPage.tsx, ManagedServiceFormDialog.tsx, ManagedServicePreviewModal.tsx) and modified (backend/main.mo, useQueries.ts, App.tsx). However, the SidebarNav.tsx file is not shown as modified, so the sidebar navigation link for REQ-89 cannot be confirmed. Several other details are unverifiable due to file truncation but appear largely implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a 'Service Management' link to the sidebar navigation (frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNav.tsx) under a 'Services' group or adjacent to the existing Services link, pointing to /service-management and visible to all users (no role gate).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any modification to frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNav.tsx. The file is listed neither as added nor modified, so the sidebar navigation link cannot be confirmed as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: DataExportCenterPage.tsx was modified to include a 'Managed Services' export module that calls actor.getManagedServices() and exports data.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested changes to DataExportCenterPage or adding managed services to the data export center. This is additional functionality beyond the specified scope.
